Articles.Content:
I mop it up.

My nonexistent puke hill

Another hill grows aside.  

Now they call this location *Twin Pukes*.

I put & Knuckles on the hill.

His hill.![k8.gif~c200](http://rs294.pbsrc.com/albums/mm114/Bakufuun_and_Cookie/Animated%20GIFS-%20sonic/k8.gif~c200)
I overthrow Knuckles and reestablishes the DunaManiacs Cobalt Republic of the Hill!(DMCRH)

The Cobalt of your republic appears to be ^60^Co.  

It emits gamma-rays and decays into Ni\*. DunaManiacs evacuate from the hill.

Now it is Evacuated Nickel Republic of the Hill (ENRH).

\*In fact, it decays into Ni, and then Ni emits gamma-rays. But why add moar drama?

**Edited <time datetime="2017-11-09T04:54:30Z" title="11/09/2017 04:54  AM" data-short="6 yr">November 9, 2017</time> by kerbiloid**

Some skeletons set camp in the ENRH and since they’re dead, they are not affected by  the radiation. They proceed to replace the abandoned government with one of their own, and dance to set their territory

![giphy.gif](https://media.giphy.com/media/pd7E3wihp5L2/giphy.gif)

The Dancin’ Skellies Republic or the Hill
I use a flamethrower and i reduce the skeletons to ashes. I have special radiation-proof clothes, so i can rule without problems. The ENRH now is the RJH (Republic Jebalistic of the Hill).

Turns out that your republic is on a relative lowland still. You just haven't travel further...

Hereby I declare the Ultimate Planetary Orb Hill Society, conquering hills to come in the planet's surface ! (we also dredge the sea base and heighten the hill if you ask.)

I flatten the planet with many Hbombs until the ocean remains, and I suck the atmosphere into the many giant caverns that I carve into the earth and flood them partially, turning the planet into an Europa clone, and making a civilization in a hill in an ocean in one of the many caves in a Sunless Sea style.

My dark, underground and civilized hill

i fire the death star at it at low power.

i then use a train-mounted volcano seeder.(the train has a rail layer on the front)

my train-track-surrounded volcano in a crater.

The dwarves living beneath the crater pay to the fire elementals and they disappear from the volcano.  

No fire. Dwarves' train and hill.

I flood the crater with all the dwarfs in it using the ice on the surface of the planet, including the volcano, which heats the ocean to allow liquid water to exist. I colonise the sea with Gungen style cities.

![databank_otohgunga_01_169_554653bd.jpeg?](https://lumiere-a.akamaihd.net/v1/images/databank_otohgunga_01_169_554653bd.jpeg?region=0,49,1560,780)

Long live the Underwater Kingdom of The Hill!!

**Edited <time datetime="2017-11-10T12:32:46Z" title="11/10/2017 12:32  PM" data-short="6 yr">November 10, 2017</time> by Nailed it!**

~~I overthrow the hill and put a queen on it oh wait~~

I raise the ~~titanic~~ uhhh hill yeah the hill

I then plant a flag.

I use my time machine to go back in time to April 29, 2012.

I then make my own hill next to the original hill...

aaand destroy the original hill while I'm at it.

My hill.![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif ":cool:")

The time machine gets found by students. It's still operational.  

One of them travels to the ancient Rome and convinces IVLIVS CAESAR to make another calendar, without April.  

So, the original hill is now unpossessed.

You might have killed the thread...

Nope. Original hill is still creates, just on a different date. [@Gojira](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/10884-gojira/)'s hill.

The hill is held by Roman Public Water Works for the spring on it. Now there's a viaduct from it.

Aqua hill.

Roman legate officially names it Clivus Aquaticus.

CLI**VV**S AQVATICVS?..  

Have no idea, how did they write "-vu-" without "u" letter.
The titanic is raised, but snags the hill along with it. It is demolished. My non-existent hill.

Yes, but diamond being made from Carbon, is flammable. Highly so when exposed to a nearby supernova.

My ashen hill

Carolus Magnus comes to the hill.  

His Aachen hill.

i claim a new hill i call it K2.

MY HILL

**Edited <time datetime="2017-12-06T19:53:39Z" title="12/06/2017 07:53  PM" data-short="6 yr">December 6, 2017</time> by kerbinorbiter**

I hijack North Korea's missile supply to be launched at your K2. The. I claim a bigger hill nicknamed 'Everest'.

My 8 km hill.
I build bigger gill and hide your hill. My hill is now the official 9km hill.
